skills.name: Work Culture Shock
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Disciplined
skills.desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Cost Reduction
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: In Training...
skills.desc: Enters the Charge state. Uses Work Culture Shock in the next action.

skills.name: 720-Degree Review
skills.desc: Seizes all Performance Points from Grunt: Field Personnel and Grunt: Security Personnel.

skills.name: Team Building
skills.desc: Summons Grunt: Field Personnel or Grunt: Security Personnel, then cause all Grunts: Field Personnel and Grunts: Security Personnel to acquire 1 Performance Point.

skills.name: Performance Boost
skills.desc: Receives 1 Performance Point after unleashing an attack. Performance Points can be seized by the attacker when this unit's Weakness is Broken or this unit receives a killing blow.
